content:
Craft an item of type: cobblestone_wall
inventory=[{"type": "cookie", "quantity": 50, "index": 16}, {"type": "yellow_concrete", "quantity": 20, "index": 17}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 6, "index": 19}, {"type": "smooth_quartz_stairs", "quantity": 24, "index": 24}, {"type": "orange_glazed_terracotta", "quantity": 52, "index": 41}]
thought: To craft the cobblestone wall, I will need to place 6 cobblestones in the crafting grid. The first cobblestone will go into slot 1, so I will move it there from slot 19 where it is stored.
Ok
act: move from slot 19 to slot 1 with quantity 1
